content:
cilium-dbg envoy admin 
 Access Envoy Admin Interface 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for admin
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg envoy 	 - Manage Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin certs 	 - List configured TLS certificates of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin clusters 	 - List configured clusters of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin config 	 - View config dump of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin listeners 	 - List configured listeners of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging 	 - List and change logging levels of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin metrics 	 - List Prometheus statistics of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin serverinfo 	 - View server info of Envoy Proxy
